description: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Permissions Matrix for Staff & HR Management Portal

hr.name: Human Resources Officer / HR Manager
hr.description: Managing employee lifecycle, HR data, payroll-related input, and compliance.

employee.salary:edit: Enter or update salary adjustments, bonuses, promotions
employee.documents:upload: Upload documents (certifications, contracts, warnings, promotion letters)

leave.approve:all: Approve/decline leave requests (if HR-level approval required)

performance.view:all: View all performance reviews, KPIs, and manager feedback

reports.hr:view: Run HR reports (headcount, turnover, attendance, leave balances)

restrictions: Cannot create system roles or modify permission structures
Cannot manage system configuration or security settings

manager.name: Department Manager / Team Lead
manager.description: Supervision of team members, operational approvals, performance reviews.

employee.view:team: View only employees in their team/department

performance.review:team: Conduct performance reviews for team members
performance.promotion:request: Submit promotion requests, warnings, or recognition notes

attendance.correct:team: Approve attendance disputes for team members

disciplinary.manage:team: Submit warnings or recognition notes for team members

restrictions: Cannot edit sensitive HR information (salary, documents, contracts)
Cannot view employees outside their team unless given cross-team visibility
Cannot change system settings, roles, or security configurations
